name: Cosmic Sandbox (V 0.1.1)
description:
A sandbox game where you are the god of your solar system! Spawn planets and stars and many other cosmic objects and see what happens. I can't put into words how underdeveloped this is, it is in MEGA MEGA ALPHA TESTING (0.1.1)

PLEASE COMMENT WITH ANY UPLOADING ISSUES.

PLEASE DO NOT COMMENT ABOUT BUGS OR UPDATES.
